data.name: SELECT_CONCOMITANT_DISEASES
data.value: select DIAG2, HR2, HRO2 from {period}DIAGNOZ where SN_POL = ? and OTD = ? and DIAGOUT = ? and DIAG2 <> ''

data.name: SELECT_DISP_ASSIGNMENTS
SELECT_DOCTORS_SPECIALITY
data.value: select ST.BUXC + M.CODE OTD_TN1, max(MP.CODEFSS) CODEFSS from BASE/DESCR/STRUCT ST join BASE/DESCR/MEDPERS M on M.PODR = ST.CODE join BASE/COMMON/MEDPOST MP on MP.CODE = M.POST where MP.CODEFSS <> '' group by 1

data.name: SELECT_INVOICE_PEOPLE
data.value: select distinct P.RECID, P.T_POL, cpconvert (866, 1251, P.SN_POL) SN_POL, P.Q, P.KT, P.W, P.DR, P.NOVOR, cpconvert (866, 1251, MSO.NAME) MSO_NAME, MSO.OGRN MSO_OGRN, MSO.OKATO MSO_OKATO from {period}S{lpu} S join {period}P{lpu} P on P.SN_POL = S.SN_POL join BASE/COMMON/SLMSO MSO on MSO.CODE = upper(P.Q) where ({section}) and ({recsvc})

data.name: SELECT_INVOICE_PEOPLE_FOREIGN
data.value: select distinct P.RECID, P.T_POL, cpconvert (866, 1251, P.SN_POL) SN_POL, P.Q, PAT.KT, P.W, P.DR, P.NOVOR, cpconvert (866, 1251, MSO.FULLNAME) MSO_NAME, MSO.OGRN MSO_OGRN, MSO.OKATO MSO_OKATO from {period}C{lpu} S join {period}I{lpu} P on P.SN_POL = S.SN_POL join {period}PAT on PAT.SN_POL = I.SN_POL left outer join BASE/COMMON/MSOIN MSO on MSO.CODE = P.Q_VCODE where ({section}) and ({recsvc})

data.name: SELECT_INVOICE_RECORDS_COUNT
data.value: select count(*) from {period}S{lpu} S where ({recsvc}) and ({section})

data.name: SELECT_NO_DOCTOR_DEPT
data.value: select distinct 'Врач ' + ltrim(S.TN1) + ' не прописан в отделении ' + S.OTD EMSG from {period}S{lpu} S left outer join BASE/DESCR/STRUCT X on X.BUXC = S.OTD left outer join BASE/DESCR/MEDPERS M on M.PODR + M.CODE = X.CODE + S.TN1 left outer join BASE/COMMON/MEDPOST MP on MP.CODE = M.POST where MP.CODEFSS is null
data.comment: Выборка ошибки - врач не привязан к отделению

data.name: SELECT_NO_SPECIALITY
data.value: select 'Специальность: "' + rtrim(NAME) + '" (' + cast (CNT as varchar(5)) + ' врачей)' from ( select cpconvert(866,1251,MP.NAME) NAME, count(*) CNT from BASE/DESCR/MEDPERS M join BASE/COMMON/MEDPOST MP on MP.CODE = M.POST where MP.CODEFSS = '' group by 1) A
data.comment: Список специальностей без кода НСИ в настройках отделения

data.name: SELECT_ONCO_DIRECTIONS
data.value: select S.BLOPEN DIRECTION_DATE, S.TR DIRECTION from {period}S{lpu} S where S.RECID = ?

data.name: SELECT_ONKO_TREAT
data.value: select S.KSG from {period}S{lpu} S where S.RECID = ?

data.name: SELECT_PEOPLE
data.value: select distinct P.RECID, cpconvert(866, 1251, P.FAM) FAM, cpconvert(866, 1251, P.IM) IM, cpconvert(866, 1251, P.OT) OT, P.W, P.DR, P.SS, cpconver(866, 1251, P.SN_POL) SN_POL, PP.Q_PASP, cpconvert(866, 1251, PP.SN_PASP) SN_PASP, cpconvert(866, 1251, P.PR) BP, cpconvert(866, 1251, P.ADRES) ADRES, P.SP, P.KT, cpconvert(866, 1251, P.FAM1) FAMP, cpconvert(866, 1251, P.IM1) IMP, cpconvert(866, 1251, P.OT1) OTP, P.WP, P.DRP from {period}P{lpu} P join {period}S{lpu} S on S.SN_POL = P.SN_POL left outer join {period}PAT PP on PP.SN_POL = P.SN_POL where ({section}) and ({recsvc}) order by 1

data.name: SELECT_PEOPLE_COUNT
data.value: select count(distinct SN_POL) from {period}S{lpu} S where ({section}) and ({recsvc})

data.name: SELECT_RECOURSES
data.value: select P.RECID PERSON_ID, S.RECID SERVICE_ID, S.OTD DEPT, S.PODR UNIT, K.MSP MSP, K.PRUPP AID_PROFILE, K.UMP PAY_KIND, UMP.SLUSL AID_CONDITIONS, S.COD SERVICE_CODE, nvl(RO.SLIZ, 'xxx') RESULT, S.IG OUTCOME, K.OPL PAY_KIND, 1 PAY_TYPE, .F. MOBILE_BRIGADE, S.BE RECOURSE_RESULT, ST.PROF BED_PROFILE, K.LDET DET, S.C_I CARD_NUMBER, S.DS DS_MAIN, .F. REHABILITATION, 'V001' INTERVENTION_KIND, S.K_U QUANTITY, S.S_ALL TARIFF, S.S_ALL TOTAL, S.OTD + S.TN1 SPECIALITY_ID, S.TN1 DOCTOR_CODE, S.D_U, K.PRUPP SERVICE_KIND from {period}S{lpu} S join {period}P{lpu} P on P.SN_POL = S.SN_POL left outer join BASE/COMMON/KMU K on cast (K.CODE as int) = S.COD left outer join BASE/COMMON/SLUMP UMP on UMP.CODE = K.UMP left outer join BASE/COMMON/REZOBR RO on RO.CODE = S.BE left outer join BASE/DESCR/STRUCT ST on ST.BUXC = S.OTD where (P.RECID = ?) and ({recsvc}) and ({section})

data.name: SELECT_SERVICES
data.value: select S.RECID SERVICE_ID, K.MSP AID_PROFILE, S.COD SERVICE_CODE, nvl(RO.SLIZ, 'xxx') RESULT, ST.PROF BED_PROFILE, S.IG OUTCOME, 1 QUANTITY, S.S_ALL TARIFF, S.S_ALL TOTAL, S.OTD + S.TN1 SPECIALITY_ID, S.TN1 DOCTOR_CODE, S.D_U, nvl(D.DBEG, DS.DBEG) DATE_FROM, nvl(D.DEND, DS.DEND) DATE_TILL, nvl(D.NOVOR, .F.) or nvl(DS.NOVOR, .F.) NOVOR, DS.SRZ_MCOD DIRECTION_FROM, DS.VESR BIRTH_WEIGHT, DS.BOLEND OUTCOME1, DS.INSTAC TRANSFER, D.OBR REASON1, nvl(DS.KD, S.K_U) BED_DAYS, nvl(D.DIAGIN, DS.DIAGIN) DS_PRIMARY, D.F CHARACTER, nvl(S.DS2, nvl(D.DIAG2, DS.DIAG2)) DS_CONCURRENT, nvl(D.DIAG1, DS.DIAG1) DS_COMPLICATION, D.HR DISPENSARY_SUPERVISION, D.HRO DCANCEL_REASON, cast (nvl(D.KSG2, DS.KSG2) as varchar(10)) CONCURRENT_MES_CODE from {period}S{lpu} S join {period}P{lpu} P on P.SN_POL = S.SN_POL left outer join {period}DIAGNOZ D on (D.SN_POL = S.SN_POL) and (D.OTD = S.OTD) and (D.DIAGOUT = S.DS) and (D.DEND = S.D_U) and (D.TABNOM = S.TN1) left outer join {period}DIAGNOZS DS on (DS.SN_POL = S.SN_POL) and (DS.OTD = S.OTD) and (DS.DIAGOUT = S.DS) and (DS.DEND = S.D_U) left outer join BASE/COMMON/KMU K on cast (K.CODE as int) = S.COD left outer join BASE/COMMON/REZOBR RO on RO.CODE = S.BE left outer join BASE/DESCR/STRUCT ST on ST.BUXC = S.OTD where (P.RECID = ?) and (S.OTD = ?) and (S.DS = ?)
data.comment: Услуги пациента в рамках обращения по заболеванию

data.name: SELECT_SERVICE_NAME
data.value: select cpconvert(866, 1251, NAME) from BASE/COMMON/KMU where CODE =

data.name: SELECT_TOTAL
data.value: select sum(S_ALL) TOTAL from {period}S{lpu} S where {section}

data.name: UPDATE_ONKO_OTHER_AIM_COMMON
data.value: update {period}PATU set DS2 = DS, DS = 'Z02.7' where (DS like 'C%') and (OTD = '0004') and ((COD in (50301, 50302, 50401, 50402)) or (floor(COD / 10000) = 6))

data.name: UPDATE_ONKO_OTHER_AIM_MAIN
data.value: update {period}S{lpu} set DS2 = DS, DS = 'Z02.7' where (DS like 'C%') and (OTD = '0004') and ((COD in (50301, 50302, 50401, 50402)) or (floor(COD / 10000) = 6))
